channel.title: [Devo] Messed up Maps Rep++
channel.description:
Hey guys!
Well today I pulled out my original Devo source and I decided to add some shit to it. I added casltewars and it was successful! But I have 1 problem. When you start out, you are in the room with all the bandages and stuff like that. You leave and go down the stairs. But the maps doesn't update. It stays viewing the lobby section unless you reach the next 'Loading - Please Wait'. So if someone could help me fix this that would be great! Thanks guys!
XLdarkwingLX

item.title: [Devo] Messed up Maps Rep++
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

410 results for update.

Also, I would believe you but almost all of ardougne, Legends guild, and gnome stronghold is messed up. Its all black xD

Read full topic

item.title: [Devo] Messed up Maps Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

It’s not your map. It’s your server telling the client what to do.

Search in your server files for something like “Update”

Read full topic

item.title: [Devo] Messed up Maps Rep++
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

It still doesn’t work :(. I think I might need new map data. What file should I replace in the cache for a new map?

Read full topic

item.title: [Devo] Messed up Maps Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

case 4418: if (c.absX == 2374 && c.absY == 3130) { c.toX = 2374; c.toY = 3133; c.heightLevel = 3; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (c.absX == 2372 && c.absY == 3126) { c.toX = 2369; c.toY = 3127; c.heightLevel = 2; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (c.absX == 2380 && c.absY == 3130) { c.toX = 2380; c.toY = 3127; c.heightLevel = 1; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

Try that.

Read full topic

item.title: [Devo] Messed up Maps Rep++
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

case 4418: if (c.absX == 2374 && c.absY == 3130) { c.toX = 2374; c.toY = 3133; c.heightLevel = 3; } if (c.absX == 2372 && c.absY == 3126) { c.toX = 2369; c.toY = 3127; c.heightLevel = 2; } if (c.absX == 2380 && c.absY == 3130) { c.toX = 2380; c.toY = 3127; c.heightLevel = 1; } break;
I’m guessing thats what you want. If not please tell me. This is in castlewars

Read full topic
